title: Explosive Demolition Engineering Laboratory Education Design Using Virtual Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of Structural Mechanics, Fundamentals of Blasting Theory, and Major-Specific Knowledge in Civil Engineering
context.additional_context: A program to enhance experimental instructional design competencies for pre-service or in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain conduction method selection criteria via virtual simulation platforms and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can perform safe blasting design by analyzing stress distribution (compression/tension zones, neutral axis) and applying ultimate stress calculation formulas during cut design.
Learners can understand explosive charge coefficients, blasthole parameters, and detonation network design principles and optimize them in simulation environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
